definitions.description: The investment entity monitors and manages indirect greenhouse gas emissions resulting from the organization's investments in projects, companies, or assets contributing to climate change.

constantValues: The investment entity monitors and manages indirect greenhouse gas emissions resulting from the organization's investments in projects, companies, or assets contributing to climate change.

members.name: investmentId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances

members.name: TTLInSeconds
members.description: Time to live in seconds.

members.name: partitionId
members.description: Logical partition id. A logical partition consists of a set of records with same partition id.

constantValues: Logical partition id. A logical partition consists of a set of records with same partition id.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: name
members.description: Name of the scope 3 category 15 investment.

constantValues: Name of the scope 3 category 15 investment.

members.name: consumptionenddate
members.description: End date of activity consumption.

members.name: consumptionstartdate
members.description: Start date of activity consumption.

members.name: customdimension
members.description: Field where custom dimension values are stored in JSON format.

constantValues: Field where custom dimension values are stored in JSON format.

members.name: dataqualitytype
members.description: Description of the data quality that identifies whether the data is actual, estimated, or another descriptor of the data.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'dataqualitytype_display' is added to the 'Investment' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'dataqualitytype'
supportingAttribute.name: dataqualitytype_display

constantValues: Description of the data quality that identifies whether the data is actual, estimated, or another descriptor of the data.

members.name: description
members.description: Optional description that provides additional detail about the entity or attribute.

constantValues: Optional description that provides additional detail about the entity or attribute.

members.name: emissionverified
members.description: Indicates whether the emissions have been certified.

constantValues: Indicates whether the emissions have been certified.

members.name: enterprisevalueincludingcash
members.description: The value of the enterprise, including cash.

constantValues: The value of the enterprise, including cash.

members.name: exposuretosovereignbond
members.description: The amount of the investment exposed to sovereign bond.

constantValues: The amount of the investment exposed to sovereign bond.

members.name: facilityid
members.description: Unique identifier for the facility associated with investment.

constantValues: Unique identifier for the facility associated with investment.

members.name: accountid
members.description: Investee account of the investment

members.name: investeescope1emission
members.description: Total scope 1 emissions for the investee. Scope 1 emissions are direct GHG emissions from sources that the organization owns or controls.

constantValues: Total scope 1 emissions for the investee. Scope 1 emissions are direct GHG emissions from sources that the organization owns or controls.

members.name: investeescope1emissionunit
members.description: Corresponding unit of measure for investee scope 1 emissions.

constantValues: Corresponding unit of measure for investee scope 1 emissions.

members.name: investeescope2emission
members.description: Total scope 2 emissions for the investee. Scope 2 emissions are indirect GHG emissions related to purchases of electricity, heat, cooling, or steam for the facility.

constantValues: Total scope 2 emissions for the investee. Scope 2 emissions are indirect GHG emissions related to purchases of electricity, heat, cooling, or steam for the facility.

members.name: investeescope2emissionunit
members.description: Corresponding unit of measure for investee scope 2 emissions.

constantValues: Corresponding unit of measure for investee scope 2 emissions.

members.name: investeescope3emission
members.description: Total scope 3 emissions for the investee. Scope 3, or value chain, emissions are from assets that the organization doesn't own or control but that the organization may affect in its value chain.

constantValues: Total scope 3 emissions for the investee. Scope 3, or value chain, emissions are from assets that the organization doesn't own or control but that the organization may affect in its value chain.

members.name: investeescope3emissionunit
members.description: Corresponding unit of measure for investee scope 3 emissions.

constantValues: Corresponding unit of measure for investee scope 3 emissions.

members.name: isincode
members.description: International Securities Identification Number, which is a unique alphanumeric identifier used to uniquely identify securities such as stocks, bonds, and other financial instruments.

constantValues: International Securities Identification Number, which is a unique alphanumeric identifier used to uniquely identify securities such as stocks, bonds, and other financial instruments.

members.name: organizationalunitid
members.description: Unique identifier for the organizational unit associated with the investment.

constantValues: Unique identifier for the organizational unit associated with the investment.

members.name: origincorrelationid
members.description: An optional identifier to correlate record with data origin.

constantValues: An optional identifier to correlate record with data origin.

members.name: outstandingamount
members.description: The outstanding amount of the investment.

constantValues: The outstanding amount of the investment.

members.name: pcafassetclass
members.description: The Partnership for Carbon Accounting Financials (PCAF) asset class for the investment.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'pcafassetclass_display' is added to the 'Investment' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'pcafassetclass'
supportingAttribute.name: pcafassetclass_display

constantValues: The Partnership for Carbon Accounting Financials (PCAF) asset class for the investment.

members.name: pppadjustedgdp
members.description: The measurement of a country/region's gross domestic product (GDP) that takes into account differences in purchasing power between country/region, allowing for more accurate comparisons of economic output.

constantValues: The measurement of a country/region's gross domestic product (GDP) that takes into account differences in purchasing power between country/region, allowing for more accurate comparisons of economic output.

members.name: propertyvalueatorigination
members.description: Property value of the investment at origination.

constantValues: Property value of the investment at origination.

members.name: sourcetransactionId
members.description: Identifier for the transaction.

members.name: totalequityplusdebt
members.description: Total equity plus debt for the investment.

constantValues: Total equity plus debt for the investment.

members.name: totalvalueatorigination
members.description: Total value at origination for the investment.

constantValues: Total value at origination for the investment.

members.name: totalprojectequityplusdebt
members.description: Total project equity plus debt for the investment.

constantValues: Total project equity plus debt for the investment.

members.name: transactiondate
members.description: Date associated with the actual date when the transaction occurred.

constantValues: Date associated with the actual date when the transaction occurred.
